event.title: months due to the position of the sun increases

data.event: The increased solar radiation during these months due to the position of the sun increases temperatures in the jungle and favors the formation of storms in the mountainous areas.

event.title: occurs in rural areas, mist is extremely rare, and 10 days

data.event: Frost occurs in rural areas, mist is extremely rare, and 10 days out of the year are foggy.
Historians report that between the years 1930 to 1940 there were many hailstorms.
